title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 326-2.1 - Acknowledgment of notice of appeal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 326-2.1 - Acknowledgment of notice of appeal

State Regulations

Upon receipt of notice of appeal or an application for
review, the secretary of the Medical Appeals Unit shall promptly acknowledge
receipt thereof by letter to the appellant and his attorney. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
326-2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
